g.aria-label: Symbol legend titled 'Region' for fill color with 6 values: South Asia, Sub-Saharan Africa, Middle East & North Africa, Latin America & Caribbean, Europe & Central Asia, East Asia & Pacific
Subtitle text 'The percentage of respondents who report having an account at a bank or another similar financial institution.'
g.text: The percentage of respondents who report having an account at a bank or another similar financial institution.
